file_content.text: What could you have said? A thousand years... it was a noble vision.
You're not even one of them. They'll always rule you, the Jedi and Sith....
I've identified several of the holograms. Sending dossiers to the military, Korriban, the bounty hunter guilds....
Anyone associated with this meeting is now an enemy of the state. Give me an hour, I'll have the Republic and the Hutt Cartel after them, too.
You said you identified "several" of the holograms--not all.
Good start. But...
Not every face was in our databanks.
You're not revealing the truth about the Star Cabal.
What are you telling people?
I'm constructing a cover story for each target, but I need more.
Hard to play conspirator when half the galaxy wants you dead.
They can't hide now.
That's the idea. Some of the crimes I'm attributing to them are even real--but I need more.
The Star Cabal keeps their secrets aboard that station. If we want to finish this, we need to know--
That's your signal being jammed. Talk to your brain-dead friends later.
Hunter. In the flesh at last.
I've been waiting to face you.
I said goodbye on Corellia, so let's get one thing clear:
Be rational, Hunter. You've already lost, there's no sense fighting.
We can still discuss this.
You disappeared before the shooting started. Finally find your courage?
Too scared to fight me before?
I had to activate the station defenses--figured you wouldn't come alone. But let's get one thing clear:
Killing the inner circle doesn't get you a free pass to our files. You want to really know what we're like? You want the keys to the galaxy?
Come take them!
You mean to say you lost Corellia?
Adjustments are being made; Stryver is already working the Mandalorians.
See? It's fine.
No holotraps this time. No distortions. Working to identify the voices.
I'll try to get a better look.
I want to listen.
There's Hunter. The Twi'lek from the recording....
Recognize anyone this time?
Tracing hyperwave communications... I know your tricks.
You may say it's fine, but I won't be comfortable until our targets are laid out for autopsy.
Yem Leksende. Czerka Corporation Special Executive. One!
Tol Braga, at least, is dead. Now we seek balance as the world quakes.
Sir Trilag of the Mecrosa Order of assassins. Two!
I've got them in my sights. Hold on.
Listen a little longer...
Don't do anything until you hear from me.
I'm going to talk to them.
What?
We knew we would be vulnerable in this moment. Despite the risk, we invited chaos, knowing we could cleanse the galaxy.
Our duty now is to survive, and as our thousand-year journey ends... we will enter a finer age.
That's what I want to discuss. I think some of you know me.
You are alive.
Enforcer! What have you done?
Everyone stop. There's someone here.
Yeah? Who's spooky now, dirtbags?
We think we've been noticed.
Scratch his name off the list.
My first targets. [Attack]
Take your time. Listen for screams.
I'm not waiting. [Attack]
Intruder!
Drinks all around--let's go.
The fight begins.
At your side, sir.
It's been a pleasure knowing you, Cipher.
Death is coming.
